【n.】[U] the feeling of wanting sth. tha: (spoken) doing sth. secret or sth. that you should not be doing 正在做（秘密或不该做的事）
They only say such unkind things about y: The children are very quiet. I wonder what they're up to.

【n.】[U] the feeling of wanting sth. tha: the opposite of what you have just mentioned 正相反；倒过来
They only say such unkind things about y: Now the reality was just the other way round.
